scripts.dc:up:dev: docker compose -p console -f docker-compose.build.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml -f docker-compose.prod-with-db.yml -f docker-compose.yml up
scripts.dc:up:dev:no-db: docker compose -p console -f docker-compose.build.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml -f docker-compose.yml up
scripts.dc:up:prod: docker compose -p console -f docker-compose.build.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml -f docker-compose.prod-with-db.yml up
scripts.dc:up:db: cross-env-shell '[ \"$SKIP_DC_DB\" != \"true\" ] && npm run dc:up:prod -- -d db || echo \"Skipping DB setup\"'
scripts.dc:up:prod:no-db: docker compose -p console -f docker-compose.build.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up
